Example Gallery¶

Following are a series of examples that illustrate how to use roipy:

  • load_bil(): load any binary interleaved format file
  • save_gdal(): save to a format supported by gdal

For more specifics of how to use the roipy instance methods, see roipy API.

Here are the examples

  • Plot an interferogram
